summary: This is an email chain from March 31, 2022, regarding the request for and transmission of exhibits shown to a JPMC witness during the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The emails discuss uploading materials to the FBI Sentinel system and sending final versions of admitted exhibits.

events.title: Email exchange about Maxwell trial exhibits
events.description: Email correspondence regarding sending the final version of JPMC exhibits that were admitted and shown to a witness during the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, and uploading them to the FBI Sentinel system.

locations.name: FBI New York Field Office
locations.context: Location from which the email was sent, mentioned in the signature.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated March 31, 2022, concerning exhibits from the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The emails discuss sending 'Maxwell exhibits that were show[n] to the JPMC witness' and uploading materials to the FBI Sentinel system.
The correspondence indicates ongoing post-trial administrative work related to evidence documentation.
The email signature identifies the sender as being from the FBI New York Field Office.
The subject matter confirms the involvement of JPMC (JPMorgan Chase) as having a witness in the Maxwell trial.
